fields.description: A document category. For example, 'Application Form', 'Photo' or 'Project Report'. In future, 360Giving will provide a codelist of document types.
fields.name: documentType
fields.title: Document Type

fields.description: What was this information last modified? A full date-time should be given. Usually this can be generated automatically by the software managing or exporting this data.
fields.name: dateModified
fields.title: Last modified
